templates.content: First, notice that ∠POQ and ∠QOR are adjacent because they share the same side OQ. For adjacent angles with a common vertex, the measure of the larger angle equals the sum of the measures of its non-overlapping parts.
Therefore we add the two adjacent angles to get the measure of the combined angle ∠POR.
Example: Finding the Measure of a Combined Angle

shots.voiceover: First, notice that angle POQ and angle QOR are adjacent because they share the same side OQ. For adjacent angles with a common vertex, the measure of the larger angle equals the sum of the measures of its non-overlapping parts.
Therefore we add the two adjacent angles to get the measure of the combined angle POR.
